text: Hey guys!  This is a bit of a stretch, but to the psychologists here: is there any good resources for “distractor” images when constructing a visual search task?  Surely there is some life-saving database of distractors I can sift through…

elements.text: Hey guys!  This is a bit of a stretch, but to the psychologists here: is there any good resources for “distractor” images when constructing a visual search task?  Surely there is some life-saving database of distractors I can sift through…

text: <@U014LRLJXRP> - hey! I am not a psychologist but this site may be interesting: <https://openneuro.org>

text: Has a bunch of open source datasets that may align with your interests.

text: No problem! Hope you have been doing well! :slightly_smiling_face:

text: I’ve been well thanks.  Same to you!  All the best :slightly_smiling_face:

text: I think distractors are very particular to the search task. Are you putting a target on a “natural” background image?
